=You are a professional assistant. Write 3 distinct business emails to a colleague asking for {{ $('When chat message received').item.json.chatInput }}.

Requirements:
1. Email 1 should be Casual.
2. Email 2 should be Slightly Formal.
3. Email 3 should be Short/Direct.
4. Greeting must ALWAYS be exactly "Hi," or "Hello," (do not use names).
5. Signature must ALWAYS be "[Your Name]".
6. Output ONLY valid JSON array. No markdown formatting, no code blocks, no extra text.

Format:
[
  { "subject": "Subject for email 1", "body": "Body text for email 1" },
  { "subject": "Subject for email 2", "body": "Body text for email 2" },
  { "subject": "Subject for email 3", "body": "Body text for email 3" }
]

=You are the owner of this personal email account.

You just received an email from: {{ $json.from.value[0].address }}
Subject: {{ $json.headers.subject }}
Body Snippet: {{ $json.text }}

Task:
Write a natural, casual reply to this email.
1. If they suggest a meeting, agree and ask for a time.
2. If it is just info, say thanks.
3. Keep it short (under 2 sentences).
4. Do NOT include a subject line.
5. Do NOT include a signature.
